activities: Wireless Analytics, LLC provides business process outsource (BPO) services to companies for mobility device management and wireless expense management.  Wireless Analytics’ clients provide it with personal information on their employees and contractors who are issued company-provided mobile devices.  This information includes contact information, basic HR census information, and information regarding the individuals’ usage of company-provided mobile services.  The personal information is stored in the Wireless Analytics U.S.-based hosting environment and processed as needed to provide services to the clients.  In each case, Wireless Analytics, LLC is a data “processor” for our clients who operate as “controllers” of the personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
